creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
text:
Created attachment 31362
Screenshot of bug

Hello,
I have been noticing since a revision after 2.9 I think some display bug on scrolling.

Reporting it for now.
If JMeter loses and gains focus , display is fixed again.
Note I reproduce it on Windows XP, Mac OS X 10.6.8 and 10.8.1.
creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
milamber@apache.org
text:
With JMeter trunk and on Linux (Debian 7 / JDK 7) this issue don't exist. (Tested on Java 6 / 7 / 8 - 64 bits)

Scrolling: with mouse roll over and scroll bar button (down).

Thanks milamber for testing.
Another note, this issue does not happen on basic case, I cannot tell when it appears but note that it may be related to size of response and test plan.
creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
text:
Difficult to reproduce and most probably a JDK bug.
Didn't notice it for a while now.
I was the reporter.
